DOC.brief_title: A Bioavailability Study Rifabutin Lopinavir/Ritonavir Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Adult Male Female 1855 yr . Subject provide write consent . Subject general good health . If female , subject postmenopausal . If female , subject pregnant breastfeeding . Subject must use birth control method surgically sterile . Subject HAVIgM , HBsAg HIV Ab positive . Positive screen drug abuse , alcohol , smoking . Can medication , include counter drug . Can previous history alcohol drug abuse . Can history major disease disorder .
